i don t like music.

participant_2.background:
I can't seem to find a place that meets all of my needs.
My car gets me to my family outings.
i deliver baked goods in the state where i live.
I need a home that is close to school and has a quiet environment so I can focus on my studies.
when i grow up , i want to be a veterinarian.

content.text: I am interested in medicine and I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up. I also enjoy baking and delivering my baked goods to people in the state where I live.
That is great! I am also interested in cooking. What is your favorite food?
I like to eat a lot of different foods, but my favorite is stew. I love the way it warms me up on a cold day.
Stew is delicious! I like it with a lot of vegetables and meat. What do you like to put in your stew?
I like to put a variety of vegetables in my stew, including carrots, potatoes, onions, and celery. I also like to add some meat, such as beef or chicken.
That sounds like a delicious stew! I will have to try making it sometime.
You should! It is a great comfort food.
I also like to collect cat-themed items. I have a lot of cat figurines, cat-themed clothing, and cat-themed books.
That is so cute! I love cats too. I have a cat named Mittens.
I love the name Mittens! It is so cute.
Thank you! I think so too.
